name: places/ChIJIyBYlxmGZAMRSbibx2x-ifk
adrFormatAddress: 47 5th Ave, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: Daniels show was incredible!! A must see  for anyone living in OR visiting NYC. The venue is stunningly gorgeous and the show itself is brilliant and intimate. Daniel will capture your full attention for 80 minutes and completely blow your mind! The most MAGICAL experience.

text.text: Daniels show was incredible!! A must see  for anyone living in OR visiting NYC. The venue is stunningly gorgeous and the show itself is brilliant and intimate. Daniel will capture your full attention for 80 minutes and completely blow your mind! The most MAGICAL experience.

originalText.text:
Daniel's magic show was by far one of the coolest activities I've done in New York City. My friend and I went on a Saturday night and upon arrival, Daniel was standing with all of his fans at the entrance personally greeting each and every one of us, getting to know us and engaging in conversations with the crowd on an intimate level, which already illustrated how much he cared about his audience. This is definitely not something I've gotten to experience when the star of a show hangs out and gets to know the audience before and after the show. We all really loved this part of the evening!
As far as the magic goes, I left the show completely blown away. I'm fairly well-versed in magic tricks, as I grew up around magic and all I have to say is after every single one of Daniel's tricks, my jaw completely dropped. Daniel does a fantastic job of keeping the audience involved and the show was very interactive with a new volunteer helping him out in every trick! I think my favorite part of the show was when he simply read my mind. That's right. Read my mind and said it out loud to the entire audience. Don't understand how that was possible but I am still thinking about it.
Overall, this was such an awesome Saturday night experience and I would go again in a heartbeat. Perfect for a friends night, date night or even a corporate outing! I highly recommend seeing one of Daniel's shows - truly an unforgettable, authentic, must-do NYC experience! :)

originalText.text: Unbelievable!!  A very talented magician who kept us engaged for the full 80 min.  What a wonderful show and we look forward to seeing him again!!

text.text: Unbelievable!!  A very talented magician who kept us engaged for the full 80 min.  What a wonderful show and we look forward to seeing him again!!

originalText.text: Fun evening. Daniel knows his stuff. He does reveal a few pointers, even if they are basic magic knowledge. I was disappointed on the venue. The "salon" is old and drab. But I recommend his show.

text.text: Fun evening. Daniel knows his stuff. He does reveal a few pointers, even if they are basic magic knowledge. I was disappointed on the venue. The "salon" is old and drab. But I recommend his show.

originalText.text: Daniel’s show is nothing short of amazing and fun.  He is a wonderfully engaging performer, and he is at the top of his profession skill-wise.  Planning to go again with other friends, this show is incredibly entertaining!
